Package com.redis.ds.ds_graph

Class GraphDS

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_graph.GraphDS
public class GraphDS extends Object
The graph data source manages an in-memory graph of vertexes and edges using an underlying GridDS to handle CRUD+S methods, storage/retrieval of the data sets via CSV files and the visualization of the current graph. Presentation UIs like SmartClient favor grid presentations, so this package will focus on normalizing the data set behind a DataGraph into vertex and edge grids where CRUD+S operations can be easily managed at the expense of duplicate memory usage. NOTES: 1) The vertex and edge GridDS instances are the "source of truth" in this package. A DataGraph can be provided to seed the vertex and edge GridDS instance, but an internal one is not maintained. Instead, methods are provided to create a new DataGraph based on the vertex and edge GridDS instances. 2) Unlike the DataGraph package which will only accept Vertex and Edge data document instances uniquely, this package will align them with unified schema definitions to support simplified UI presentations.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
See Also:
  • VisJS Network Documentation

  • Constructor Details

    • GraphDS

      public GraphDS(com.redis.foundation.app.AppCtx anAppCtx, String aName)
      Constructor accepts an application context and graph name parameters and initializes the class accordingly. Use this constructor when you are fully building the underlying data graph and its related grid data sources.
      Parameters:
      anAppCtx - Application context
      aName - Name of the data graph

    • GraphDS

      public GraphDS(com.redis.foundation.app.AppCtx anAppCtx, String aName, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aVertexSchemaDoc, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc anEdgeSchemaDoc)
      Constructor accepts an application context and graph name parameters and initializes the class accordingly. Use this when you have previously defined the data graph vertex and edge schemas (e.g. CSV) and can assign them prior to adding items.
      Parameters:
      anAppCtx - Application context
      aName - Name of the data graph
      aVertexSchemaDoc - Vertex schema definition
      anEdgeSchemaDoc - Edge schema definition

    • GraphDS

      public GraphDS(com.redis.foundation.app.AppCtx anAppCtx, com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aVertexSchemaDoc, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc anEdgeSchemaDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Constructor accepts an application context and a data graph parameters and initializes the class accordingly. Use this when you intend to save the data graph as a CSV file where during that process the unified vertex and edge schemas will be defined.
      Parameters:
      anAppCtx - Application context
      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      aVertexSchemaDoc - Vertex schema definition (can be null)
      anEdgeSchemaDoc - Edge schema definition (can be null)
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source exception
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Data model mismatch

    • updateVertexSchema

      public boolean updateVertexSchema(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc)
      Updates the data items captured in the vertex DataDoc against the schema. The data items must be derived from the schema definition. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      aSchemaDoc - Data document instance
      Returns:
      true on success and false otherwise

      Data grid instance
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source exception

    • addVertex

      public boolean addVertex(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Adds the vertex data document to the internal grid data sources.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Vertex data document instance
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeds or false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis labs exception

    • addEdge

      public boolean addEdge(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSrcVertex, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDstVertex, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Adds a data document instance as an edge between the source and destination data document vertexes to the internal grid data sources.
      Parameters:
      aSrcVertex - Source vertex data document instance
      aDstVertex - Destination vertex data document instance
      aDataDoc - Data document instance representing the edge

      true if the operation succeeds and false otherwise

      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs internal exception

    • updateVertex

      public boolean updateVertex(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Updates the vertex data document in the data graph and rebuilds the grid data sources. Note: This operation focuses solely on the vertex properties and not its relationships.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Vertex data document instance
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeds or false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs exception

    • loadVertexApplyUpdate

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc loadVertexApplyUpdate(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Convenience method that will pre-load a DataDoc from the data source, apply the changes identified in the method parameter, perform the update operation and return the full version of the data document instance. Note: This operation focuses solely on the vertex properties and not its relationships.
      Parameters:
      aDataDoc - Data document instance (just items that changed)
      Returns:
      Data document instance reflect complete updates
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Data source related exception

    • updateVertexEdge

      public boolean updateVertexEdge(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSrcVertex, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDstVertex, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc anEdge) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Updates the edge of a source vertex - the update could consist of property changes and/or edge type and/or the assignment of a different destination node.
      Parameters:
      aSrcVertex - Source vertex data document instance
      aDstVertex - Destination vertex data document instance
      anEdge - Data document instance representing the edge
      Returns:
      true if the operation succeeds and false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs internal exception

      public boolean updateVertexEdges(com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aVertexDoc, com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid anEdgeDataGrid) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Updates the vertex data document and its related edges (captured in the data grid parameter) and rebuilds the data structures. This operation can be expensive due to the rebuilding of the internal data graph.
      Parameters:
      aVertexDoc - Vertex data document instance
      anEdgeDataGrid - Data grid of edge documents
      Returns:
      true if the update succeeds or false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs exception

    • saveToCSV

      public void saveToCSV(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aDataGraph, PrintWriter aPW) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException, IOException
      Saves the data graph to the path name specified. This method will generate a unified DataGrid CSV output stream for the graph vertexes and edges.

      aDataGraph - Data graph instance
      aPW - Print writer output stream
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs general exception

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception

    • saveToCSV

      public void saveToCSV(String aPathFileName) throws IOException
      Saves the data graph to the CSV path name specified. This method will generate a unified DataGrid CSV file for the graph vertexes and edges.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - Absolute path/file name
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception

    • loadFromCSV

      public void loadFromCSV(String aPathFileName) throws IOException, com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Loads the data groph from the CSV path file name specified. The CSV should have been saved with the "saveToCSV()" method. This method assumes that the vertex and edge schemas have been previously defined.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - Data graph CSV path file name
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs general exception

    • loadFromCSV

      public void loadFromCSV(String aVertexPathFileName, String anEdgePathFileName, String aCSVPathFileName) throws IOException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException, com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Loads the graph vertex and edge schemas from the specified file names followed by the loading of the data graph definitions via the CSV path file name.
      Parameters:
      aVertexPathFileName - Graph vertex schema path file name
      anEdgePathFileName - Graph edge schema path file name
      aCSVPathFileName - Graph CSV path file name
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O related exception
      ParserConfigurationException - XML parser related exception.
      SAXException - XML parser related exception.
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs general exception

    • visualizeToString

      public String visualizeToString(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aCompleteDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aMatchedDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc anOptionsDoc) throws com.redis.foundation.std.FCException
      Generates an HTML document (as a string) containing the graph visualization logic. This method will highlight any portion of the graph that matches the data graph instance provided as a parameter. This HTML document can be rendered in any modern browser.
      Parameters:
      aCompleteDataGraph - Data graph instance of complete graph
      aMatchedDataGraph - Data graph instance that should be matched
      anOptionsDoc - Graph configuration options data document
      Returns:
      HTML document string
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.std.FCException - Redis Labs exception

    • visualizeToFileName

      public void visualizeToFileName(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aCompleteDataGraph, com.redis.foundation.data.DataGraph aMatchedDataGraph, String aPathFileName, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc anOptionsDoc) throws IOException
      Generates an HTML document (as a file) containing the graph visualization logic. This method will highlight any portion of the graph that matches the data graph instance provided as a parameter. This HTML document can be rendered in any modern browser.
      Parameters:
      aCompleteDataGraph - Data graph instance of complete graph
      aMatchedDataGraph - Data graph instance that should be matched
      aPathFileName - Path file name for the HTML document
      anOptionsDoc - Graph configuration options data document
      Throws:
      IOException - IO exception

    • addProperty

      public void addProperty(String aName, Object anObject)
      Add an application defined property to the data grid.

      Notes:

      • The goal of the DataDoc is to strike a balance between providing enough properties to adequately model application related data without overloading it.
      • This method offers a mechanism to capture additional (application specific) properties that may be needed.
      • Properties added with this method are transient and will not be stored when saved or cloned.
      Parameters:
      aName - Property name (duplicates are not supported).
      anObject - Instance of an object.

    • updateProperty

      public void updateProperty(String aName, Object anObject)
      Updates the property by name with the object instance.
      Parameters:
      aName - Name of the property
      anObject - Instance of an object

    • deleteProperty

      public void deleteProperty(String aName)
      Removes a property from the data grid.
      Parameters:
      aName - Name of the property

    • getProperty

      public Optional<Object> getProperty(String aName)
      Returns an Optional for an object associated with the property name.
      Parameters:
      aName - Name of the property.
      Returns:
      Optional instance of an object.

    • clearProperties

      public void clearProperties()
      Removes all application defined properties assigned to this data grid.

    • getProperties

      public HashMap<String,Object> getProperties()
      Returns the property map instance managed by the data document or null if empty.
      Returns:
      Hash map instance.
